channel.title: water, elemental, necrotic damage on
channel.description: Recent content in water, elemental, necrotic damage on

item.description: [[Dust of Dryness]] Wondrous item, uncommon This small packet contains 1d6 + 4 (dice: 1d6+4) pinches of dust. You can use an action to sprinkle a pinch of it over water.
